discourse_list.title: SES Biweekly Status Update: DeFi Advocacy & the European Crypto Initiative

content.content: SES Biweekly Status Update: DeFi Advocacy & the European Crypto Initiative  euci-initative1280×720 114 KB   This Week’s Topic: DeFi Advocacy & the European Crypto Initiative  Join us here! on 2022-04-15T14:30:00Z  On this SES Biweekly Status Update, SES Legal Research will host the European Crypto Initiative (EUCI), an advocacy group that specializes in DeFi in Europe. EUCI aims to shape EU regulations to favor open, permissionless, decentralized applications leveraging blockchain technologies. EUCI’s founders will join SES on this call to share updates on regulatory developments in Europe, the main challenges MakerDAO is facing, and educate the community on why strong advocacy resources are important for MakerDAO’s sustainability. Add the SES Status Update Call to your calendar  Other Updates  960×540 55.1 KB   Incubator News  960×540 71.3 KB    Chaos Labs published a forum post update on their incubation progress. The post discusses the unique challenges the Maker Protocol faces during development cycles, and details a collaboration with @sidestream-core-unit for creating a solution to test auction services.  Maker Academy is continuing development of their MVP. New content, website features, and internal content management processes are all under development. The incubating Lending Oversight Core Unit (LOVE-001) has begun the process of drafting their MIP set, and is targeting the next governance cycle for submission.   With the Community!  960×540 59 KB   04.13 Focus On #9: Dai Foundation Core Unit Update Recording Live! 04.18 #ETHDay: How to Create Your Dream Job in Crypto with @Lenkla More information on attendance and live streams here. 04.19 #DAOist: Scaling Up MakerDAO Beyond the Dunbar Number with @wouter More information on attendance and live streams here.  04.20 Focus On #10: MIP6 vs. TradFi Add it to your calendar  04.27 Focus On #11: AMA with New Silver Add it to your calendar  Contacts  960×540 56.3 KB   Links  Discord Drive Notion   @ses-core-unit
Let’s go! Ready for some good updates!
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
